QuestData.Title: The Scarlet Palisade
QuestData.Description: We need someone with "initiative" like yourself to drive the Scarlet Crusade to the grave.$b$bProve to me you are capable of serving The Dark Lady by travelling west to the tower past the Solliden Farmstead and slaying 10 warriors of the Scarlet Crusade.
QuestData.CompletionText: If you wish to prove your worth to The Dark Lady, slay 10 Scarlet Warriors, $c.
QuestData.RewardText: Most excellent, $c. Your skill in the art of combat is undeniable.
